title: Digital Signal Processing (DSP)
desc: Developing algorithms for signal enhancement, filtering, compression, and feature extraction.

title: Wireless Communicationg Systems
desc: Investigating physical layer protocols for 5G, 6G, and future wireless technologies.

title: MIMO and Beamforming
desc: Exploring spatial signal processing techniques to increase channel capacity and reliability.

title: Machine Learning for Signal Processing
desc: Applying AI and deep learning models to improve communication system performance, especially in dynamic environments.

title: Software-Defined Radio (SDR) and Embedded Systems
desc: Implementing and testing real-time communication algorithms on hardware platforms.

title: Spectrum Sensing and Cognitive Radio
desc: Researching adaptive spectrum access techniques for dynamic spectrum allocation.

title: Audio Video Transmission
desc: Researching Audio and Video in Telecommunication Systems.
